reviewText: Brilliant, if you like you humor very dark. Chris Morris is the king of dark. Also check out Brass Eye, some cringe worthy stuff there as well.

if "eraserhead" were done as a tv sketch comedy show, this would be it.  not recommended for anyone who hasn't survived a bad acid trip.  very funny and disturbing in ways you can't imagine.  you'll feel guilty & ashamed for laughing.
says region 0, but it is in PAL format, so it may or may not play on your machine.
The best TV show that most of us here in the US haven't had a chance to see.  Absolutely mind boggling good.
